about.heading: About Us
about.title: Our Achievement Story
about.description: Our company was founded in 1969 by Ziya Ocak with the principle of being a pioneer in the automotive industry. Over the years, we have gained trust both in Turkey and abroad by manufacturing door, window, trunk seals, fuel tank belts, foam profiles, and strip gaskets. Since 2000, we have expanded into PVC hoses and PVC profile production, serving industries such as automotive, construction, packaging, and footwear, while continuously increasing our product variety. We also have the capacity to produce special sponge types, strip gaskets, PVC hoses, PVC profiles, as well as EPDM hoses and profiles according to samples or technical drawings.
